Articles.Content: I've seen it before. I want to have two pictures in my signature and I don't know how to do it. How do I do it?
Just paste the BBcodes of the two pics you want next to each other in the edit signature text field.

 I have a problem. It says I can't use it more then once? What?!
I just put Imgur links in my signature wherever I want pictures, just like I would with a forum post. I don't really bother with the "signature picture" function anymore.
